data.title: Uranus meets Pluto: Warren Beatty and Annette Bening
data.text:
posted October 03, 2012 06:15 AM Yesterday I was thinking what might happen if a highly Uranian (esp. in regards to Moon and Venus) individual meets someone else, with whom they share strong Plutonic links.

Would they be repelled by each other? Insanely attracted? Repulsed and attracted at the same time?

What would be needed astrologically to keep an Uranian "planted" - emotionally, as much as that is even possible.

The couple that came to mind were Warren Beatty and Annette Bening, as I remember him having a Venus-Uranus-conjunction and well he definitely has had quite some reputation before getting married. *laughing*

(actually now that I think abuot it, did not LIz Taylor had Venus-Uranus-conjunction, too?)

Anyway, so he was flitting through life, the eternal bachelor, until he met her.

Apparently he said: ""Meeting for lunch in San Pietro, a pizza restaurant in a mini-mall near his office in Beverly Hills, Beatty says that he knew within minutes that she [Annette] was the one. Long past due to settle down, "I was looking for someone to make me good" is how Beatty puts it."

Source: Christopher Goodwin. "Taming of the screw." The Evening Standard. 3/7/2002."

Of course I have no idea how happy they are with each other, but they`ve been married for 20 years I think.

So what is there going on astrologically.

First of all, Beatty`s natal configurations:

1)

Venus conjunct Uranus in Taurus in 8th house

quinkunx

Mars in SAgittarius in 3rd house

There actually is an interesting split in Beatty`s chart.

Yes, his bachelorhood can be easily seen by his Venus-Uranus-conjunction (and Uranus in 8th house), and tied to Mars in Sagittarius.

And looking at the asteroids, isn`t it interesting that asteroid CUPIDO is EXACTLY on his Aries-Sun?

Plus the asteroid LUST falls right onto the midpoint of his KARMA-NN-trine, sextile to both, and is on 18 Aquarius in 5th house.

On the other hand he also ha some very intense natal configurations, esp. involving Pluto.

1)

Moon conjunct LILITH (the Black Moon, I donÂ´t use the asteroid in synastry) in Scorpio

trine Pluto in Cancer

sextile Jupiter in Capricorn

and Pluto is opposite Jupiter

he also has:

3)

EROS on 28 Aqua conjunct UNION on 27 Aqua

sextile

NESSUS on 27 Aries

quinkunx

Pluto on 26 Cancer

And yes that obviously means he has a square of retro Nessus to retro Pluto. Whoa.

And EROS and LUST both in Aqua def. resonate with the Uranustheme in terms of his Venus.

----------------------

no matter what the synastry will show, I strongly doubt that he would ever have settled down with a woman who does NOT resonate with uranus, in the very least it seems to indicate he needs someone able to do her own stuff and give him space, someone who is independent and does not DEPEND on him, but at the same time she probably would need a lot of inner strength, maturity and capacity of compassion and unconditional love.

Checking for Bening`s chart what I see is this:

1) she has

Sun on 7 GEmini

opposite

LUST on 8 Sag

sextile/trine

Uranus on 8 Leo

Now, if THAT Doesn`t fit the bill!

Doesn`t look like she might get too clingy.

She also has a configuration speaking of seriousness, and a more sober and responsible kind. Not an easy one by any means though.4

Mars on 23 Pisces

square

Saturn on 23 Sagittarius

trine/quink

JUNO on 25 Cancer

And this very interesting configuration.

KARMA on 15 Gemini conjunct UNION on 16 Gemini conjunct AMOR on 14 Gemini

square

EROS on 16 Pisces

Well, where her husband has Union conjunct EROS she has AMOR there. Seems she has the capacity for unconditional love and it is part of what an union requires for her, though being in Gemini, still not the clingy kind.

I find it intersting how both have love asteroids highlighted in the Air-signs.

And one of them mentioned in an interview that one secret of their working relationship is the fact that they have a big house. Exactly what i would expect to hear from someone with Air-signs or Sagittarius emphasised.

posted October 03, 2012 06:29 AM But what is there in their synastry, possibly indicating they might settle with each other?

First of all there was one aspect that made me laugh SO hard when I saw it.

her Uranus on 8 Leo squares his Venus-Uranus on 5-7 Taurus

It seems like he has met his equal here! This is a woman who would NOT like to get tied down, who would like the excitedness, but would not try to "catch" him. In a way, if he projected his Uranus onto her, his Venus i Taurus would be a tiy bit freer to express itself.

And it is interesting how he seems to be a little more invested in the relationship in interviews than she does.

He quite possibly met his mach here, who simply reversed the roles.

Apart from that:

his KARMA trine her VALENTINE (1)

his AMOR conjunct her Sun exact

his VALENTINE trine her EROS

Put quite simply, he might just love her.

They share some Uranian aspects as well, which reflect their natals:

his Sun trine her Uranus

his Venus square her Uranus

his Mars trine her Uranus

his Uranus conjunct her Black Moon Lilith

But these might have been related to more of a commitment kind of connection:

his Moon trine her Juno

his Saturn trine her Juno

- HEr Juno closed a GT water trine between his Moon-Saturn, giving their interaction depth and longevity

Oh and her Union-Karma-Amor falls onto his SN.

Apart from that interestingly:

his Jupiter opposite her Juno exact

his OSIRIS opposite her ISIS exact

But what I noticed is that they have quite some "obsessive synastry"; I was looking at aspects to Pluto, BML and yes, even Nessus for this:

his Venus conjunct her BML

his Pluto conjunct her Juno and trine her Mars

his BML trine her Mars and Juno exact (GT in Water)

his NESSUS conjunct her Venus exact

his Moon opposite her NESSUS exact

his Mars quinkunx her BML exact

his Pluto square her Venus exact

his NESSUS square her Juno (2)

Phew witht hese kind of obserssive aspects between them it isprobably good they are quite Uranian/ airy, independent in their love asteroids and Venus.

Two "Uranians" making Plutonic /or BML synastry, quite an interesting mix I think.
